description:
It’s time to channel your inner geek with our DIY electronics e-class. In less than an hour, learn all the basics of DIY-ing with electronics. Brit + Co's very own Brit Morin will teach you the fundamentals of electricity, including: atoms, currents, electrical charges and circuits. From there, you’ll make two (yes, TWO!) DIY electronics projects. The first is an LED headband, and the second is your very own lamp.

Still need the supplies to get started? Head over to the Brit + Co Shop and pick up our DIY electronics kit. It’s got everything you need to get started.
title: DIY Electronics
